mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, t.accType_type, c.rp_offSeason_weekday, c.rp_offSeason_weekend, c.rp_peakSeason_weekday, c.rp_peakSeason_weekend
LIMIT #{offset}, 10;
SELECT a.*, b.`sc_name` FROM `lemo_product_servicereginfo` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_servicecate` AS b ON a.sc_no = b.sc_no WHERE `acc_id`= #{acc_id}

SELECT a.*, b.acc_id, c.acc_name FROM `lemo_diary_article` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.res_no = b.res_no JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS c ON b.acc_id = c.acc_id WHERE b.`acc_id` = #{acc_id} LIMIT #{offset}, 10;
SELECT b.* FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` AS a JOIN `lemo_member_userinfo` AS b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE acc_id = #{acc_id}

SELECT a.*, b.mcp_id FROM `lemo_product_coupon` AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM `lemo_member_coupon` WHERE `user_id`=#{user_id}) AS b ON a.`cp_id` = b.`cp_id` WHERE ( `acc_id`= #{acc_id} OR `cp_group` = 'ALL' OR (`cp_group` = 'acc_province' AND `cp_type`= #{province_no}) OR (`cp_group` = 'acc_type' AND `cp_type`=#{accType_no}))
AND CURDATE() <= `cp_end`
SELECT a.*, b.mcp_id FROM (SELECT * FROM `lemo_product_coupon` WHERE `cp_id`=#{cp_id}) AS a left JOIN (SELECT * FROM `lemo_member_coupon` WHERE `user_id`=#{user_id}) AS b ON a.`cp_id` = b.`cp_id`
SELECT count(`arti_no`) FROM `lemo_diary_article` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.res_no = b.res_no WHERE `acc_id` = #{acc_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `lemo_product_review` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.res_no = b.res_no JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS c ON c.room_id = b.room_id WHERE b.acc_id = #{acc_id}

SELECT *, IFNULL(`room_checkIn`, acc_checkIn) AS `checkInTime`, IFNULL(`room_checkOut`, acc_checkOut) AS `checkOutTime` FROM `lemo_product_room` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_ratepolicy` AS c ON a.acc_id = c.acc_id WHERE `room_id`= #{room_id}
mapper.sql: SELECT a.*, b.acc_id, b.res_checkIn, c.room_name, d.acc_review, d.acc_rate,e.photo FROM `lemo_product_review` AS a JOIN `lemo_product_reservation` AS b ON a.res_no = b.res_no JOIN `lemo_product_room` AS c ON c.room_id = b.room_id JOIN `lemo_product_accommodation` AS d ON b.acc_id = d.acc_id JOIN `lemo_member_userinfo` AS e ON e.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.acc_id = #{acc_id}

FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY a.room_price, IFNULL(a.empty_room_stock, a.room_stock) desc) 'order' FROM( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', a.user_id, a.acc_name, a.accType_no, a.province_no, a.acc_city, a.acc_zip, a.acc_addr,a.acc_addrDetail, a.acc_longtitude, a.acc_lattitude, a.acc_xy, a.acc_mainInfo, a.acc_info, a.acc_comment, a.acc_thumbs, a.acc_rate, a.acc_review, a.acc_season,a.acc_state, r.room_maxNum 'room_maxNum', r.room_id, r.room_price 'room_price', r.room_stock 'room_stock', r.room_thumb, r.room_name,r.room_addPrice,r.room_info,r.room_checkIn, r.room_checkOut, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) as 'empty_room_stock', ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id ORDER BY r.room_price, IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock) desc) 'top', SUM(IFNULL(b.empty_room_stock, r.room_stock)) OVER(PARTITION BY a.acc_id) 'sum_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.acc_id 'acc_id', r.room_id 'room_id', (r.room_stock - COUNT(rero.rero_id)) 'empty_room_stock' FROM `lemo_product_accommodation` a JOIN `lemo_product_room` r ON a.acc_id = r.acc_id JOIN `lemo_product_reserved_room` rero ON r.room_id = rero.room_id AND r.acc_id = rero.acc_id
WHERE AND r.room_state = 1
AND (rero.rero_checkOut_date > DATE(NOW()) AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < DATE_ADD(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL 1 DAY))
AND (rero.rero_checkOut_date > #{checkIn} AND rero.rero_checkIn_date < #{checkOut})
GROUP BY a.`acc_id`, r.room_id ) b ON a.acc_id = b.acc_id AND r.room_id = b.room_id
WHERE AND r.room_state = 1
ORDER BY a.acc_id) a WHERE (a.empty_room_stock != 0 OR (a.sum_room_stock = 0 AND a.top = 1))
AND a.room_maxNum > #{headcount}
) a
JOIN `lemo_product_accommodationtype` t ON a.accType_no = t.accType_no LEFT JOIN `lemo_product_ratepolicy` c ON a.acc_id = c.acc_id
WHERE a.order = 1 AND a.acc_state = 1
AND a.`accType_no` In(${accTypes})
AND (a.`room_price` BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice})
